item.title: Job posting
item.description: Canadian Grain Commission Winnipeg (Manitoba) CH-03 Indeterminate, Specified period $82,579 to $106,319 Closing date: 17 June 2022 - 23:59, Pacific Time Who can apply: Persons residing in Canada, and Canadian citizens and Permanent residents abroad. Important messages # We are committed to providing an inclusive and barrier-free work environment, starting with the hiring process. If you need to be accommodated during any phase of the evaluation process, please use the Contact information below to request specialized accommodation.
